about_the_game:
Orc Incursion is a real-time strategy game that focuses on survival and skirmish gameplay. The game features both player versus environment (PvE) and player versus player (PvP) modes. In survival mode, players must defend their base from waves of enemy orcs while also attacking enemy base to win. The game also features a small campaign mode that allows players to experience the game’s story and mechanics in a more structured way.

Players must use their strategic skills to build and manage their base, train and upgrade their units, and research new technologies to gain an edge over their opponents. The game features a variety of different units and structures, each with their own strengths and weaknesses, and players must carefully balance their resources and priorities to succeed.

Some of the key features of Orc Incursion include:

• Real-time strategy gameplay with a focus on survival and skirmish modes
• Player versus environment (PvE) and player versus player (PvP) modes
• A survival mode that you must defend their base from waves of enemy orcs
• A small campaign mode that allows players to experience the game’s story and mechanics in a more structured way
• A variety of different units and structures, each with their own strengths and weaknesses

We hope you enjoy playing Orc Incursion and look forward to hearing your feedback!
